languages.text: "Да охранят нас фильтры знания, дарованные Богом-Машиной, от искусов и ужасов нечестивых откровений".
"May the filters of knowledge bestowed upon us by the Machine God protect us from the temptations and horrors of blasphemous revelations."
languages.original_text: "Да охранят нас фильтры знания, дарованные Богом-Машиной, от искусов и ужасов нечестивых откровений".

traits.locale_text: "May the filters of knowledge bestowed upon us by the Machine God protect us from the temptations and horrors of blasphemous revelations."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "May the filters of knowledge bestowed upon us by the Machine God protect us from the temptations and horrors of blasphemous revelations."

languages.text: “愿万机之神赐予我们知识的过滤器，保护我们免受亵渎性启示的诱惑与恐怖所害。”
languages.original_text: "May the filters of knowledge bestowed upon us by the Machine God protect us from the temptations and horrors of blasphemous revelations."

traits.locale_text: “愿万机之神赐予我们知识的过滤器，保护我们免受亵渎性启示的诱惑与恐怖所害。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Que los filtros de conocimiento otorgados por el Dios Máquina nos protejan de las tentaciones y los horrores de las revelaciones blasfemas».
languages.original_text: "May the filters of knowledge bestowed upon us by the Machine God protect us from the temptations and horrors of blasphemous revelations."

traits.locale_text: «Que los filtros de conocimiento otorgados por el Dios Máquina nos protejan de las tentaciones y los horrores de las revelaciones blasfemas».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「機械神が自分たちに授けた知識のフィルターが、冒涜的な啓示の誘惑や恐怖から自分たちを守ってくださらんことを願う」
languages.original_text: "May the filters of knowledge bestowed upon us by the Machine God protect us from the temptations and horrors of blasphemous revelations."

traits.locale_text: 「機械神が自分たちに授けた知識のフィルターが、冒涜的な啓示の誘惑や恐怖から自分たちを守ってくださらんことを願う」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Mögen uns die Filter des maschinengott-gegebenen Wissens vor den Verlockungen und Schrecken blasphemischer Offenbarungen beschützen."
languages.original_text: "May the filters of knowledge bestowed upon us by the Machine God protect us from the temptations and horrors of blasphemous revelations."

traits.locale_text: "Mögen uns die Filter des maschinengott-gegebenen Wissens vor den Verlockungen und Schrecken blasphemischer Offenbarungen beschützen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Puissent les filtres du savoir que nous a accordés le Dieu-Machine nous protéger des tentations et des horreurs des révélations blasphématoires. »
languages.original_text: "May the filters of knowledge bestowed upon us by the Machine God protect us from the temptations and horrors of blasphemous revelations."

traits.locale_text: « Puissent les filtres du savoir que nous a accordés le Dieu-Machine nous protéger des tentations et des horreurs des révélations blasphématoires. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "May the filters of knowledge bestowed upon us by the Machine God protect us from the temptations and horrors of blasphemous revelations."

languages.text: "Makine Tanrı'nın bahşettiği irfan filtreleri bizi kâfirce vahiylerin cezbediciliğinden ve dehşetinden korusun."
languages.original_text: "May the filters of knowledge bestowed upon us by the Machine God protect us from the temptations and horrors of blasphemous revelations."

traits.locale_text: "Makine Tanrı tarafından bahşedilen irfan filtreleri, bizi kâfirce bilgilerin cezbediciliğinden ve dehşetinden korusun."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
